messages.message:
For table extraction, remember the magic words :slightly_smiling_face:
1. To trigger table extract chain - start your prompts with “Extract all tables ... ” and required details.
2. For specifying the return format - you can specify “return in markdown format” or “return in json format” as well.
Wanted to call out the settings gear wheel took me a good 2-3 minutes for find based on the instructions. we should consider moving it elsewhere
Yes, we have got this feedback already. We did something very quick for internal users, and will consider other options before we release it to external users.
Looks like we only accept xlsx, and not xls... This seems much more pressing now that we've got tables working!
@Lalit @Rakesh - can we support xls files, perhaps through conversion? Let’s track it as a new request.
Also, @Varun Jain - doesnt look like this is on Prod yet.  Is that correct?  Is there a way to know that we are using the table methodology
It is only available in sandbox ENV right now for testing and internal feedback. We will stabilise and scale it for UAT environment early next week for sales demos.
